website_summaries.verdict: While the steel craftsmanship of the components is impressive, this set also comes with a few quality issues that are surprising considering the high-end price.
pros: This competition-level set has shoes and stakes made of solid steel and suitable for recreation to tournament games
Owners brag about the weight an performance of the shoes
Set includes a wooden storage case and rule book
cons: Though durable, it would be handy if the stakes were a bit longer
Finish on the shoes tends to fade over time, making them all appear to be the same color

customer_reviews.title: Nice idea, poor execution
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set due to mostly positive reviews and because it had the storage box. I received the product and the wood storage box was broken and useless. Nice idea on the box, but probably much too heavy to be reliably shipped without damage. I needed the horseshoes for Memorial Day event so I went ahead and installed the stakes and used the horseshoes. The finish literally started coming off the horseshoes immediately, and after only one day of use is pretty much completely worn off. Wishing I would have purchased a different brand. The stakes work just fine and the finish was okay.
customer_reviews.author: Fast Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product in a showy box, excessive charge for returns
customer_reviews.text: Bought based on good reviews but discovered the quality less than expected especially at this price. Upon return to vendor was assessed with a 36% restocking fee due to appearance of use! That was simply unreasonable. I would caution anyone purchasing from this vendor!
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Well made and lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set. The shoes feel good in your hand. Nice wood case as well. After playing quite a few games, with the shoes going in the sand and the sun beating on them ,the colors start looking similar and are a little hard to tell apart. I applied a little paint to them to make it easier. Not a serious issue at all. I've bought a Walmart set of horseshoes before and this set is way better.
customer_reviews.author: Chauncey Besaw

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, short stakes.
customer_reviews.text: As noted by others, the stakes are too short and won't hold firm...but I knew this before buying. Otherwise great quality. Recommend getting longer stakes if you're serious about horseshoes. The short stakes provided (I assume) shorter than necessary to give the wood case a better from factor for storage/portability.
customer_reviews.author: RJF

customer_reviews.title: ... took a chance even though there were a few bad reviews, but I'm glad we did
customer_reviews.text: We took a chance even though there were a few bad reviews, but I'm glad we did! Our wooden box was just fine when it arrived and we used these horseshoes all weekend long and the paint is just fine as well. I'm sure over time they will fade and we can repaint them, but this set is great especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BROKE BOX
customer_reviews.text: Got my product yesterday and while I haven't used them yet, right out of the box, the wooden carrying case was broken. It's sad cause for the price, that should of came in one piece. I'm gonna use some wood glue to piece it back together but for that price, package a little better so it doesn't happen. Will revise my review later, after actually using the horse shoes
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Games by the River.
customer_reviews.text: My son two years ago purchased a home on the river/lake * depending on where you are from*. He and his Girl Friend love playing games, the competition of it all. The rest of my family is the same. This was the perfect gift! Here's to many years of enjoying family time.
customer_reviews.author: Traci

customer_reviews.title: Nice set, the horseshoes are well made
customer_reviews.text: Nice set, the horseshoes are well made. My problem is with the box. The wood box top is made to slide out, but the stuff inside is jammed against the top to the point where it is impossible to slide open. I basically wrecked the box getting to the horseshoes.
customer_reviews.author: James Laabs

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Nice set, horse shoes are steel, haven't had any problems except the colors are a bit close, hard to tell as the sun goes down and after a few beers. As with all of the sets it seems the stakes are too short, replaced them with 1/2 X 36" rebar stakes from Lowes. Awesome.
customer_reviews.author: DReinert

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Box came in completely broken was package horrible this was a Father’s Day present didn’t have time to rerun my husband glued the box together also the actual horseshoe are thinner than I expected and since it was packaged so badly done paint war off already . Not worth the price
customer_reviews.author: LaDlae King

customer_reviews.title: Quality Restitution of My No Fault In Damaged Case
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in the damaged product mainly the carrying case! The only recourse I’ve been given is to return damaged product & will receive new one! If Amazon would not have packed such a heavy item loose in a cardboard box Then I would not at 80 yrs old & disabled & now to be faced w the task I’m not able to accomplish! So I’m stuck & feel I have been taken advantage of. Help! It was a B’day present f my son so he has crushed carrying case! Thank you Jo Ann M Bezet
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn M Bezet

customer_reviews.title: Trash Box
customer_reviews.text: Shoes and stakes are good, box is a total piece of garbage. Simply carried it by the handle and the whole box fell apart while carrying. Not worth the price markup for a trash wood box. Thought it would make everything nice and compact for easy organization and transport, no. Better off buying a more durable bag and shoes/stakes separately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent set of shows however, could be better
customer_reviews.text: Product came quickly. Don’t expect the wooden box to be in tack when it arrives. The wooden box was smashed up. The shoes are fine however, it would have been great if the poles were longer.
customer_reviews.author: Big Daug

customer_reviews.title: it works just fine, just don't go throwing the case in the ...
customer_reviews.text: American Made never disappoints. If you want a real set of horse shoes, spend the extra cash and buy this set period. Regarding the case, it works just fine, just don't go throwing the case in the back of your truck because it's wood holding forged steel,...it'll break the wood case. If your not abusive with the case it works perfect.
customer_reviews.author: isaac soto

customer_reviews.title: Where's My Colors?
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I expected better. The shoes are shaped well, have a good weight, and are pretty much what you would expect; however, the second time I went to use them, I discovered the gold/copper color had faded almost completely. Only one day of use, return to box, and then the second use it was very difficult to tell the pairs of shoes apart. This is very inconvenient for the price. I am sure the next time I use them, it will be pretty much impossible. If you want to buy these, go ahead. But, just know that you are going to need to spray paint them or find another way to tell them apart very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: J. S. Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: First shipment arrived damaged. Second shipment arrived great. Excellent quality
customer_reviews.author: JCE

customer_reviews.title: A+ quality
customer_reviews.text: This is one heck of a solid set. It is super heavy, very sturdy, and the wooden box carrying case is awesome. This is by far the most quality horseshoe set I have seen. Great for parties and adults and young kids will love this.
customer_reviews.author: Grassshopper021

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes, nice sound.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, nice sound when I occasionally make a ringer.
customer_reviews.author: James F. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Solid shoes and a nice wood box
customer_reviews.text: Solid shoes and a nice wood box. The weight is good and it seems durable. However the paint started chipping and corroded away.
customer_reviews.author: Godric

customer_reviews.title: product u get is not whats pictured
customer_reviews.text: The product pictured is not what you get. Instead of a nice wooden box with silver and gold shoes, u get a crappy plastic box with blue and silver shoes and a crappy paint job on both the shoes and the pins. At least it is still "forged" in america...
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Shoes throw great stakes are short 24" is to short for permanent pits. Also dislike powder coat.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes except for the powder coat. Coating Chips off easily I'll just bead blast and paint them.
customer_reviews.author: Francis V.

customer_reviews.title: Very good value
customer_reviews.text: Nicely weighted shoes in a sturdy case. Only thing better is if the set came with a hammer to pound the pegs in. Big recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: Gm.

customer_reviews.title: Personal review from an unbiased person
customer_reviews.text: Poorly crafted wooden container, came broken because of the insufficient padding they provided. Wouldn’t recommend product.
customer_reviews.author: lucas

customer_reviews.title: Great material but after 8-10 games I can no longer ...
customer_reviews.text: Great material but after 8-10 games I can no longer tell the different between the two sets. Take some paint and mark one pair, the gold set fades extremely fast.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: If your looking for horseshoes with a case, this is not the set for you.
customer_reviews.text: The wooden case that the horseshoes came in is a joke. The horseshoes are way too heavy for the box and it fell completely apart. The horseshoes are a good quality however.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene

customer_reviews.title: Solid , sturdy horseshoes the  very best
customer_reviews.text: These are the best horse shoes ever my husband loves them. solid , sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Evans

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes but the stakes could be a bit longer for better hold in the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Jose M.

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes poor paint
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the horseshoes appears to be good but after just a few games the paint wore off making it extremely hard to distinguish between gold and silver shoes
customer_reviews.author: C W

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: My whole family enjoys these horseshoes in the summer, great product and we all love the competition
customer_reviews.author: Family Handyman

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, short stakes
customer_reviews.text: Good horse-shoes but the stakes should be longer. I replaced the stakes with home-made cheap steel rods.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hutcheson

customer_reviews.title: Super!!
customer_reviews.text: We usually throw these while their still on the horse. Super !!
customer_reviews.author: Danny G. Parry

customer_reviews.title: Love these and durable.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift and goes through rough tough men using them and they have held up well and durable. Great gift and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: AZ girl

customer_reviews.title: St. Pierre Horeshoe Set
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful good quality horseshoe set with durable wooden case. Exceeds expectations. The horse shoes are heavy sturdy metal and made to last.
customer_reviews.author: J.A R.

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes but they are not marked A and B
customer_reviews.text: Good shoes but they are not marked A and B. After the paint is worn off there is no way to tell them apart.
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Theses are made of quality . We and the children enjoy playing when the family gets together. And now we are practicing alone to get better.
customer_reviews.author: char

customer_reviews.title: Father's Day Gift
customer_reviews.text: Received timely. Description was accurate for product received, appears to be a quality product. My husband loved it and the fact that it was made in the US. Would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Great set, but the plastic carry handle was broken ...
customer_reviews.text: Great set, but the plastic carry handle was broken beyond repair so you have to lug the heavy set around. Other than that, its a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy E.

customer_reviews.title: quality US made horseshoes!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a birthday party at our house and they were excellent. Best quality shoes I have seen. Plus they are made in the USA so I felt good about buying them.
customer_reviews.author: Nick in Portland

customer_reviews.title: Tour de Force
customer_reviews.text: An excellent set of professional horseshoes. Well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: BILL GROGAN

customer_reviews.title: Great Set
customer_reviews.text: Quality shoes for a good price. The stakes are too short though. That keeps me from giving it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: D. Long

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Read the directions for the poles; you can't just pound them into the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Breelightful

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend. Horseshoe set still looks great after using many times.
customer_reviews.author: txsunshine

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product, beautiful storage box
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product, beautiful storage box. Wish it would have been packaged better for shipping because the wood storage box was broken.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy and a big hit!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this set. We recently went camping and another family brought some horse shoes and they ask where we got ours because they tend to go through sets a lot because of them breaking. My only complaint is that they colors are too similar. But a little paint will fix that
customer_reviews.author: C. Javier

customer_reviews.title: Made in the USA Horseshoe!
customer_reviews.text: Made in the USA! Very happy about that. Perfect horseshoe set!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa R Vitali

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved the shoes but carrier was very thin and damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Sonnie Torrey

customer_reviews.title: Shoes for Joes
customer_reviews.text: The quality of these shoes are incredible. They've stood up to the harsh Afghanistan rocks and the wear from Soldiers. The color was the only issue I had. When we threw the shoes into the sand they would gather so much dust that it was hard to tell which color was which. This was easily fixed with two colors of spray paint.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: ... using them for several weeks and are having endless fun. The balance of the shoes is very good ...
customer_reviews.text: We have been using them for several weeks and are having endless fun. The balance of the shoes is very good and they came in a nice case. Best of all they were made in America!!!
customer_reviews.author: Camille Quenneville

customer_reviews.title: Birthday Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 90 year old cousin who is in very excellent shape and plays horse shoes on a regular basis. He loved it and said it was a great brand.
customer_reviews.author: Shari D

customer_reviews.title: I love playing Horshoes!
customer_reviews.text: thank you for the item! Love the case it came in! And I have played by my lonesome for hours just practicing my pitches! It was timely delivery and fun to have. Item was described and I ABSOLUTELY LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Jon Burke

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best all around shoes. Gordon's are to smooth and slip.
customer_reviews.author: Cody T.

customer_reviews.title: Great horseshoes, crappy box
customer_reviews.text: The horseshoe set itself is very nice. The problem was that the box must have warped from weather changes because it took two grown men over a half hour and some twine rigged to the box to get the thing to slide open. Now I've gotta sand down the lid to make it fit again...in the meantime its not much of a storage box.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Irving

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very nice set of shoes , they feel great and flip nice
customer_reviews.author: mrc

customer_reviews.title: July 4th BBQ upgrade!!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. This was the highlight of my July 4th BBQ
customer_reviews.author: Grappagal

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Horseshoes are okay. You might as well throw the box away as soon as you get it. Falls apart.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie V.

customer_reviews.title: Lid is never going to go back in but the game itself is nice and durable
customer_reviews.text: lid was incredibly difficult to slide out. In fact I had to take a mallet and chisel to it to actually get to the game. Lid is never going to go back in but the game itself is nice and durable. may need to color one of the sets another color since they look very similar but it's not hard to distinguish during close gameplay.
customer_reviews.author: dr.cakes

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good horseshoes!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these horseshoes because my previous ones by Franklin broke in half shortly after first using them. The horseshoes from St. Pierre are high quality forged steel, with a smooth plating and made in America! The only reason that I didn't give them five stars is because of the plating came off relatively faster than I thought.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy W. Bey

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and nice looking case
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and nice looking case. 4 stars because the shoe colors are too similar. I would criticize the posts for being too short or thin (vs regulation) but that is the same for all the kits. I feel like the plastic handle on the case will probably break, rope would have been a better choice.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Superhawk

customer_reviews.title: The only bad thing I have to say about this item is ...
customer_reviews.text: I received this as promised. The only bad thing I have to say about this item is the wooding box the horses are stored in When I received it, the wooding box on the top is cracked. It's hard to open up, which required a hammer to pull it open. Once open, now it's hard to close back. The horse shoes are made of good quality and is very heavy too.
customer_reviews.author: Kee

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very Disappointed. I purchased these for my father as a Father's Day present. After playing with entry-level recreational sets for as long as I can remember, I wanted to get him, what I thought, was a professional set. I picked this set in particular because of the reviews and the description supplied by the manufacturer. Within one day of pitching with these shoes, the coating not only started to fall off, but created burrs where you would ordinarily hold the shoe. As nice as the box is, the shoes are not close to the quality you would expect for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Chris L

customer_reviews.title: These are so very much better than the cheaper Chinese versions
customer_reviews.text: American made still means quality. These are so very much better than the cheaper Chinese versions. We use these at the beach. Constantly exposed to humidity. Absolutely no degradation. Th she shoes are heavy and super durable. I'm 59. I played horseshoes with my dad when I was a child. These are the shoes I remember. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: John L.

customer_reviews.title: Very excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Made in America! Sturdy steel! Great wooden storage box. Very pleased. I had read in a different review that they held up in Afghanistan... I can see why.. Quality purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Totallyfarmgirl

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: very beautiful case and I set however is extremely hard to open and close
customer_reviews.author: Richard Zeller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best of the best it's the only one still made in the USA
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Coating easily chipped
customer_reviews.text: Overall, satisfied. However, after a few uses, I noticed that the resin coating on the horseshoes became scratched up causing the edges to be very rough, enough to scratch your hands. I was surprised that it was so easily scratched from basic use in the back yard.
customer_reviews.author: AJ Green

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.text: We are enjoying our horseshoe set very much. It is a quality product. Would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: horseshoe set
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase have already enjoyed playing. would be nice if there was more contrast between the color of the shoes, but a little spray paint fixed the issue. Worth the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Hunterpa

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive!
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed on the high quality of forged horseshoes these are! We tried them out for the first time about a week ago and my 17 year old son like to "line drive" them towards the horseshoe stakes. The don't break because that would have broke the other "Made in China" horseshoes that i've bought before. I also am very impressed with the customer service from the St.Pierre company. I mean, I sent them a question and Mr. St. Pierre answered me with a personal email. That was huge and now I'm a loyal customer. I'm having a huge party this weekend, so we'll see how they and I do!
customer_reviews.author: John Lippert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy set! Horse shores don't break sturdy steel. Real fun at any out door party!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret M. Lorne

customer_reviews.title: better wood box
customer_reviews.text: The wood box was a little cheaply I already have a creak in it made but I like the set
customer_reviews.author: william stover 2nd

customer_reviews.title: great product !
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this set, everything about it is great. Good quality, cool carrying case, and lots of fun. Definitely recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Quality horseshoe set
customer_reviews.text: I got exactly what I thought I was going to get. I think the stakes could be a little longer though.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Zbin

customer_reviews.title: Horseshoe Heaven
customer_reviews.text: great product, shipped quickly, all in good order, and made in the U.S.A. good quality product. we tried it last night and love it!
customer_reviews.author: J. stout

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: it was a gift and the recipient was very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Patton

customer_reviews.title: shoes and case are nice
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint I have is how short the stakes are. Regulation pits require the stake to stick 15 inches out of the ground. These stakes were too short with not enough driven into the ground which caused them to move every time a shoe hit the stake. I bought some three foot concrete stakes that were the same diameter and they worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon D King

customer_reviews.title: Good set!
customer_reviews.text: Just what we were looking for! Heavy duty equipment, should last for years. Would certainly recommend to any one looking for a great set.
customer_reviews.author: Kay M. Muse

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is the best horse shoe set I have had by far, the product is made out of great quality steel and the balance of the shoes are just awesome. I have really enjoyed this set since arrival and don't think I will have to purchase another one anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: Wil

customer_reviews.title: Great Set of Shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful set of horseshoes that come with a very nice box to keep everything clean and together. I bought them for my dad for father's day and we have really enjoyed playing with them on the beach.
customer_reviews.author: jiggaman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great construction, great quality. The box for carrying them is very well made and convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline A Brigham

customer_reviews.title: Horseshoe set
customer_reviews.text: Horseshoes are fine but wooden box was warped and unusable. This is a big problem as the horseshoes are heavy and need a sturdy container.
customer_reviews.author: Susan A Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Gift For Father! Great Quality Set. Box is WONDERFUL! Only Ones Made In USA!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was an absolute all around fantastic purchase, The box is that of a collectors item. We keep them out in our 'Mud' room as a decoration. They are wonderful and my father is the envy of the neighborhood! Highly Satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Levi Roberts

customer_reviews.title: horse shoes
customer_reviews.text: a great product in a much as these shoes are light weight which will help the seniors in playing Horseshoes.
customer_reviews.author: Empathy Inc.

customer_reviews.title: US made shoes
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these shoes as they are the only ones still made in the US. Most of the others come from China and whether they are comparable or not did not matter.
customer_reviews.author: Hawkeye

customer_reviews.title: Grat Product and Service
customer_reviews.text: Delivered earlier than estimate, perfect shape, just as described Excellent
customer_reviews.author: Richard C. Markey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Christmas. He loves it! The storage case is beautiflly wood burned and the quality of the gaming items is excellent. Most importantly it is 'Made in the USA'.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: bad purchase
customer_reviews.text: the horseshoe broke in half almost immediately and the replacement I got also broke. Not a good quality. I would definitely look to buy a set made in USA
customer_reviews.author: Linda Mendelson

product_meta.title: St. Pierre American Professional Horseshoe Set in Wood Case
product_meta.description: The unique design of this horseshoe set was created by a champion in the game to help anyone play like the pros. A finger positioner allows for accuracy, while the trademark forged tips grab hold of the stake for more ringers. All pieces fit into a stylish solid pine box for easy portability. Proudly Made in the USA. NHPA Approved for Tournament play. Ideal for special gifts, leagues, clubs, and serious players.. More weight forged into the tips for maximum balance and control. Tapered leading edge that allows the shoe to slide onto the stake. Longer tips to grab the stake for more ringers. Ringer breaker to rotate the shoe and lock in ringers. Finger positioner to help hold the shoe like the Pros. Set includes two 24" solid steel stakes, rulebook, and Mahogany stained carrying case. Set contains all the equipment necessary for 2 to 4 person play.. 2 silver and 2 gold American horseshoes. 2 24" silver stakes. Rulebook with court layout. Comes in an old fashioned, attractive pine box with mahogany finish, built in handle, and burnt in logo. Material: Drop Forged Steel.
feature_bullets: Ideal for special gifts, leagues, clubs, and serious players.
More weight forged into the tips for maximum balance and control
Tapered leading edge that allows the shoe to slide onto the stake
